::Shredder::

Shredder frowns. "I'm not sure. We've been gone for a while, so bots 
that I know might have come and gone. I could go check it out if you 
want."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., t882hcc91@y... wrote:
> NightBlade:
> 
>      She had heard his tactics. They seemed sound, but he still had 
> no target, he seemed to be a wandering fool, to her. "Excuse me?! 
You 
> don't know who you are going to attack? What?"
> 
> Magmatron:
> 
>      "Little one," he said, putting his hand on her back. "Do not 
> worry, we will have a target soon enough."
> 
> NightBlade:
> 
>      "Pfft!" She said, pushing his hand off, she did not notice the 
> small bug burroing into her exterior (what would you call the metal 
> outside of a Transformer in Robot Mode?). "Yea, I'm sure, if you do, 
> call me."
>      With that she walked out of the base and towards nowhere.
> 
> Magmatron:
> 
>      "Let her go," He said after she had left. "She might still come 
> in useful later."
>      His troops should know that he would have bugged her, but not 
> where or with what type of transmitter, basically because it was 
new.
>      "Shredder," Magmatron said. "Would you still have contacts 
> withing the Predacon ranks?"
>      A new plan had formed in his mind...
